Story Title: Policy Explain (full trace) on Node Inspector
Description: Expand Router Decision to show allow/deny chain, rule path, and inputs.
Acceptance Criteria: Click 'Explain' shows rule path, matched conditions, and final decision.
Tests: ui snapshot; contract test for rulePath & inputs.

Description: Simulate proposed changes to policy for a node and preview impact.
Acceptance Criteria: Given inputs + rule, returns hypothetical decision & deltas.
UI/Frontend: Explain drawer → What-if tab returns decision deltas.
Tests: e2e simulate happy/deny; unit rule delta format.

Story Title: Add trend charts for qDepth/batch/KV hit
Description: Render per-metric mini line charts (no style deps) and show p95 latencies.
Backend switcher with metric breakdown and last-30m detail.
Acceptance Criteria: Switcher filters data; detail table paginates spans.
Tests: e2e switcher; contract: backend filter respected.

Description: Click 'Export' produces JSON + signature bundle including SBOM/Cosign/SLSA.
UI/Frontend: Evidence tab → Export button; Verify action.

Description: Badge links open artifact detail; copy URIs.
Fix types, remove @ts-nocheck, add strict settings for Maestro build.
Tests: CI job green; unit compile step.

Description: Introduce tsconfig.maestro.json and base tsconfig for monorepo.
Acceptance Criteria: Both builds share base; Maestro has strict flags.

Story Title: Correlation graph (CI failures ↔ SLO burn ↔ cost anomalies)
Description: Compute correlations in window and surface likely related events with confidence score.
Acceptance Criteria: Correlated cluster contains ≥2 event types; score displayed.
UI/Frontend: AlertCenter → clusters list with detail drawer.
Tests: unit: scoring fn; e2e: cluster renders.

Description: Admin can define correlation rules and mute/snooze routes.
Acceptance Criteria: Rules persist and apply to correlation view; snooze hides non-actionables.
Tests: e2e: rule modifies clusters; mute hides alerts.

Description: Timeline shows agent roles; HITL steps marked with decisions.
Acceptance Criteria: Steps render with metadata from run graph.
Tests: ui smoke; contract tests for roles.

Description: Operators can approve/edit/block at checkpoints; result applied to run.
Acceptance Criteria: Server records decision; run state updates.
UI/Frontend: Action bar with shortcuts & keyboard handlers.
Tests: e2e: block halts; approve resumes; edit mutates input.

Description: Render GH annotations filtered by env/branch; quick filters.
Acceptance Criteria: Filter state preserved in URL; deep links persist.
UI/Frontend: CICD page updated; filters & saved state.
Tests: ui test: filter chips; contract: query respected.

Description: Compute test flakiness and show stability trend per test.
Acceptance Criteria: Trend chart renders; flake rate per test shown.

Description: Add accessibility checks to CI; fail on serious violations.
Acceptance Criteria: CI fails on critical issues; report artifact uploaded.

Description: Streaming logs and alerts announce changes; dialogs have aria-describedby.
Acceptance Criteria: Screen readers announce updates; focus order validated.
UI/Frontend: Apply to Command Palette, Replay dialog, AlertCenter.
Tests: manual a11y checklist; unit for live region hooks.
